structured.description: A real-time dashboard using Streamlit and Quix. It fetches data from an API endpoint, caches it using `st.cache_data`, and then displays a dynamically updating Bokeh bar chart and table in Streamlit. The chart shows page counts for different page IDs and the table displays the underlying dataframe.

items.description: Fetches data from an API, prints a message indicating its progress, converts the response to JSON format, constructs a Pandas DataFrame from the data, and returns it.

returns.description: A pandas DataFrame object that represents the JSON data fetched from the API.

usage.description: This line of code fetches data from API, parses JSON response into a DataFrame and assigns it to the variable df.

items.name: get_data

items.description: Retrieves cached data by calling the `get_data` function and returning its result. If the data is not cached, it will be fetched from an unknown source (not shown). The `@st.cache_data` decorator ensures that subsequent calls to this function return the cached result instead of recalculating it.

returns.description: A cached version of data obtained by calling the function `get_data`.

usage.code:
cached_result = get_cached_data()
# Use cached_result as needed

items.name: get_cached_data
